item.title: Simple mirror effect helps you slay on Instagram!
item.description: Super easy way to make mirror effect! Select a photo twice Choose the layout you like Tap on one of the photo Tap Horizontally flip tool *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Simple mirror effect helps you slay on Instagram!"

item.title: How to make your Instagram post stand out?
item.description: Choose a photo and click ‚ÄúMore‚Äù on sticker page Go to ‚ÄúFree‚Äù section and find ‚ÄúShape Stickers 2‚Äù Add the transparent frame to make a shadow effect!
